mission.posting: tyc00n needs you to breach a really protected server for programs.

email.subject: Helping a new friend
email.body: #PLAYERNAME#!, Hey!, There's one thing I need to finish the script, it's some scripts and dlls, don't worry about this assignment, it's hidden and Kael won't see it unless I give him permission, the dlls and scripts are located in a really security strong server, once you've got the files you must upload them to my computer, specifically the ~home/escape~ folder, the scripts and dlls must have the name "solution" on it, I'll be waitin', I'll link you my laptop and
